<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get all pomodoro sessions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pomodoro-sessions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Получить список всех Pomodoro-сессий пользователя.
Можно фильтровать по привычке, задаче или периоду времени.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"habitId","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Фильтр по привычке"},{"name":"taskId","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Фильтр по задаче"},{"name":"from","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"description":"Начало периода"},{"name":"to","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"description":"Конец периода"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","userId","type","startedAt","duration","interrupted","createdAt"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"p1","readOnly":true},"userId":{"type":"string","example":"u1","readOnly":true},"habitId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Связь с привычкой (см. Habits API)","example":"h1"},"taskId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Связь с задачей (см. Tasks API)","example":"1"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["work","shortBreak","longBreak"],"example":"work","title":"PomodoroType"},"startedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2025-11-15T10:00:00Z"},"completedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2025-11-15T10:25:00Z"},"duration":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Фактическая длительность в секундах","example":1500},"interrupted":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"Была ли сессия прервана"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","readOnly":true}},"title":"PomodoroSession"}},"examples":{"habitSessions":{"summary":"Сессии для привычки","value":[{"id":"p1","habitId":"h1","taskId":null,"type":"work","startedAt":"2025-11-15T10:00:00Z","completedAt":"2025-11-15T10:25:00Z","duration":1500,"interrupted":false}]},"taskSessions":{"summary":"Сессии для задачи","value":[{"id":"p2","habitId":null,"taskId":"1","type":"work","startedAt":"2025-11-15T11:00:00Z","completedAt":"2025-11-15T11:25:00Z","duration":1500,"interrupted":false}]}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
